text: And it shall be the prince’s part to provide the burnt offerings, grain offerings, and drink offerings for the feasts, New Moons, and Sabbaths—for all the appointed feasts of the house of Israel. He will provide the sin offerings,45:17 Or purification offerings; also in verses 19, 22, 23, and 25 grain offerings, burnt offerings, and peace offerings to make atonement for the house of Israel.
